subject: Order shows delivered but not received
description_text:
Hello. Both my orders have the same tracking number and it states they have
been delivered.  However only one order was delivered.

SSN 3090 not delivered
SSN 3086 delivered

Single tracking number
SF6045993559346

conversations.body_text: Hi richard tanner,    Please check if your Haptics package includes the plus x control box purchased under order #SSN3090. Our warehouse staff likely combined the two orders.

This is not the case.  The box only contains the haptics.  As mentioned, I
only received one order.

On Mon, Nov 3, 2025, 9:55â€¯PM service@simsonn.com
Hi richard tanner,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We will resend it to you. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047026465441
